amendment.description: An amendment numbered 110 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit funds from being used to make any U.S. contributions to the United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC), the United Nations Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR), and the United Nations Relief and Works Agency (UNRWA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 212 (Roll no. 470).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 212 (Roll no. 470).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Yoho.
